website_summaries.verdict: A Mary Poppins bag that will hold just about everything.
pros: Large, sturdy bag that’s also waterproof
High-quality polyurethane leather is easy to clean
Tall enough to stand up bigger beauty supplies, like shampoo
Available in three colors that match everything
cons: Some issues with the lining coming loose

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed I ordered one for me and one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I ordered one for me and one for my daughter. Received them yesterday and the inside fabric is already coming off on both boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crochet

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be very sturdy. I couldn't find any flaws in this makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: This makeup case is smaller than it looks in the picture. However, it does have a lot of room in it. It's deep enough for a can of hairspray, brush and other makeup items you might want to put in it. It appears to be very sturdy. I couldn't find any flaws in this makeup case.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on other favorable reviews. I used to have a similar one that was soft case, for years, but unfortunately became water-damaged. I hadn't been able to find a replacement until I saw this one at Amazon. This case is awesome. Well-constructed, sturdy, has a quality zipper, and a real mirror on the inside cover (not the mylar type). The patent leather is nice and can be wiped off easily if it becomes dirty. The inside is lined with a fabric material, and my only concern is it might get dirty. Overall very pleased, and exceeded my expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: P.Seley

customer_reviews.title: so searching for something like that to put in there
customer_reviews.text: I finally found an overnight beauty container that fits all my needs and my taller items!! Only wish it had a divider inside, so searching for something like that to put in there. This is very sturdy and has nice zippers. The burgundy is gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lea

customer_reviews.title: Tall and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This case is too big to travel with but I just love the fact that it’s tall and I can store bottles in it upright. It keeps all of my night routine items in one place and off of the countertops. I plan to purchase another once I see a different color. I’ll use that for my day time routine. I will say the strap across the top lost the little metal button but it hasn’t fallen apart. The zipper works and the strap stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to keep all my make up in at home. However I know when traveling it would hold up and be the best. But when I travel only take a few items. Nice and sturdy. And that’s what I was after. I didn’t want the soft cloth ones, I wanted one that was more like a box.I organize my make up in little tiny bags. Such as foundation in one bag, mascara eyeliner in another bag and so on. These bags fit perfectly in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It was so beautiful but I was so disappointed with how the interior ...
customer_reviews.text: It was so beautiful but I was so disappointed with how the interior was falling apart and the zipper kept getting stuck when ever I tried to close or open it...I don't know if it was just my purchase or not but I'm not sure I'd risk buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case and has held up well.
customer_reviews.text: Great size, nice made and it’s one of those you can’t find anymore- like the old days. Zipper has held up well, As has the lining I read others reviews. I’m very happy with my purchase. And because the lid is deep you get extra inches so it really packs in a lot of stuff. I don’t travel lightly. I own several bags, and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not long enough
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for my medicine when I travel. It’s cute, looks expensive, well made. It has gold zipper that works like a charm. It’s deep enough to put my taller medicine bottles. I only gave 4 stars because I thought it would be longer. I just have to use 2 cases for my medicine n vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Decent little case. Came with several tears/cuts, but I needed it quickly so I won't be returning it. It's nothing that affects functionality. The size is good and fits full size bottles of make up, removers, and the tall prescription bottles. It is also quite sturdy, but a little larger than what I would take on a flight unless I had a lot of things to take.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carderelli

customer_reviews.title: Beauty box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice beauty box with ample room inside for your cosmetics. It looks elegant from the outside and th handle makes it convenient to take anywhere and look chic. What could improve this box is perhaps addition of another level or pocket inside and a smoother zipper. But overall, I'm pleased with it. It does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, beautiful color, and large enough to hold all my makeup, glasses(in their cases) and just about anything that I can fit in there. The box is also strong and sturdy. I definitely recommend this box if you're travelling and want to keep your things in a easily accessible place that can just go from your suitcase to wherever you need it to be. I love this box.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my makeup which I keep under the bathroom sink. Nice and sturdy, can be wiped off with a damp cloth and tall enough for my bottles of face lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell inside
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the design. I bought the tan/khaki color. It seems sturdy and I’m sure it will hold quite a bit. My biggest issue is the horrible chemical smell that the interior has. I have had it over a week and have been trying to air it out and it still smells. I tried febreeze, an odor absorber etc. and it still has a funky smell. It has faded a bit- and hopefully it will completely disappear otherwise I will get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: LS495

customer_reviews.title: Good for brushes
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to keep my makeup brushes and this is tall enough for it. Fits them all. I ll buy one more and make it my personal traveling makeup bag ready to go so I don’t have to get all busy doing that.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size case. It is deep and wide enough to hold a variety of sized items. This is a beautiful case. Good quality. Feels sturdy and not flimsy. I look forward to using this daily. I bought it to use as my makeup case. I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: SiFiSpaceBunny

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made deep case
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for what I wanted it for. I like that it’s deeper than a lot of other cases I had seen. It’s well made and the zipper works smoothly. The handle feels very secure as well. I think this will last many years
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ocain

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Update :Unfortunately it broken after five months. I guess you get what you paid for... It fits my skincare and some makeup products. I'm not fan of the reopened but you can't beat the price. It's well made and definitely worth to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Konbu

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is big, well made and the red color is very pretty. It holds all of my products so my bathroom counter is not cluttered. I am really glad I bought it and will likely get another

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!!

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful... but
customer_reviews.text: the smell bothers me a little, but hopefully the newness will fade. Otherwise it is a beautiful color.

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and matches my luggage set.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and matches my luggage set which is the only reason I purchased it! It's spacious! It does have a chemical smell. I left it open to let it air out. Also, I'm not sure how sturdy it is. I'm going to do an update after I've traveled with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this - loved it when it arrived - but it didn't last very long. I don't know what happened, but the entire thing started falling apart - like the glue that was used to hold it together was only designed to last X amount of months and then bit by bit it all began falling apart. Honestly, I rarely used it - in the sense of taking it out anywhere - it was mostly used 'in-house' to keep certain items. I fear to think how soon it might have come apart if I had actually used it for travel, etc.

product_meta.title: Train Case,COOFIT Travel Makeup Case Train Cases Crocodile Pattern Leather Beauty Box for Women
feature_bullets: Makeup Train Case: COOFIT designs and manufactures various makeup cases, cosmetics cases, tools, and accessories, perfect for makeup artist or beginner. Fine workmanship and high quality material.
Premium Material: This Makeup Case is made of high quality PU Leather, High Capacity Cosmetic Box. Inside you will be surprised to find 3 elastics to hold brushes or mascaras, a mirror.
Dimensions: 24 x 18 x 21 cm/9.4 x 7.0 x 8.2 inches (W x H x D), COOFIT travel makeup case is a great case for traveling or for just storing your makeup at home.
This is a nice large case to hold just about anything. Its made for makeup but its large enough to hold bigger bathroom supplies like perfumes and body washes.
Top flap closes with 2 zippers, Inside you will be surprised to find 3 elastics to hold brushes or mascaras, a mirror. The handle makes it easy to carry anywhere you may need to go.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars201 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
